dailyQuotes.quote: Over every mountain there is a path, although it may not be seen from the valley.
dailyQuotes.author: Theodore Roethke

dailyQuotes.quote: Someday is not a day of the week.
dailyQuotes.author: Denise Brennan-Nelson

dailyQuotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
dailyQuotes.author: Steve Jobs

dailyQuotes.quote: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
dailyQuotes.author: Napoleon Hill

dailyQuotes.quote: Without hustle, talent will only carry you so far.
dailyQuotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

dailyQuotes.quote: You always pass failure on the way to success.
dailyQuotes.author: Mickey Rooney

dailyQuotes.quote: No one is perfect. That’s why pencils have erasers.
dailyQuotes.author: Wolfgang Riebe

dailyQuotes.quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
dailyQuotes.author: Chinese Proverb

dailyQuotes.quote: Be not afraid of growing slowly, be afraid only of standing still.
dailyQuotes.author: Chinese Proverb

dailyQuotes.quote: Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without one.
dailyQuotes.author: Chinese Proverb

dailyQuotes.quote: A closed mind is like a closed book; just a block of wood.
dailyQuotes.author: Chinese Proverb

dailyQuotes.quote: Better to light a candle than to curse the darkness.
dailyQuotes.author: Chinese Proverb

dailyQuotes.quote: He who cheats the earth will be cheated by the earth.
dailyQuotes.author: Chinese Proverb

dailyQuotes.quote: Nobody can make you feel inferior without your permission.
dailyQuotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

dailyQuotes.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
dailyQuotes.author: Mark Twain

dailyQuotes.quote: Educating the mind without educating the heart is no education at all.
dailyQuotes.author: Aristotle

dailyQuotes.quote: In the end, it’s not the years in your life that count. It’s the life in your years.
dailyQuotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

dailyQuotes.quote: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
dailyQuotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

dailyQuotes.quote: Life is ten percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it.
dailyQuotes.author: Lou Holtz

dailyQuotes.quote: The only disability in life is a bad attitude.
dailyQuotes.author: Scott Hamilton

dailyQuotes.quote: There is more to life than increasing its speed.
dailyQuotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

dailyQuotes.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
dailyQuotes.author: Confucius

dailyQuotes.quote: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
dailyQuotes.author: Albert Einstein

dailyQuotes.quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
dailyQuotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

dailyQuotes.quote: Each person must live their life as a model for others.
dailyQuotes.author: Rosa Parks

dailyQuotes.quote: Life is not about how fast you run or how high you climb, but how well you bounce.
dailyQuotes.author: Vivian Komori

dailyQuotes.quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
dailyQuotes.author: Buddha

dailyQuotes.quote: Don't find fault. Find a remedy.
dailyQuotes.author: Henry Ford

dailyQuotes.quote: Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind.
dailyQuotes.author: Albert Einstein

dailyQuotes.quote: Winning is fun, but those moments that you can touch someone’s life in a very positive way are better.
dailyQuotes.author: Tim Howard
